process_label: [bool], generate ground truth labels or not
rm_incomplete_tile: [bool], delete incomplete tiles or not, default False
analyze_bands: [array], bands for training, e.g. [1, 2, 3]. If not specified, will use all bands.
visualize_bands: [array], bands for visualize, e.g. [1, 2, 3]. If not specified, will use all bands
virtual_dataset: [bool], use virtual dataset or not when merge, default to false
class_field: [str], field in the shapefile that difference classes
ignore_background: [bool], whether to ignore background. Default to ignore, unless there are only two classes plus background.
deploy: [array], the element in array should be one or many data_name
deploy_mode: [str], when deploying two or more datasets, use deploy_mode to set how they combine, could be append or stack. Default is append.
use_snapshot: [int], use which snapshot to generate test weight.
batch_size: [int], batch size when training. default to 6
substract_mean: [bool], whether to calculate mean value of each channel, default to False.
class_names: [array], class names, how many class names here indicts how manay classes, and each class is represented by its array index. There is an extra class, namely background class exists. You can choose to ignore this class by using ignore_background option
class_colors: [array], color of each class, e.g. [[r,g,b,a],[r,g,b,a], default to random generated colors
